title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 31 August 2012 - XWiki
content:
10:30 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <CIA-118> Vincent Massol master \* rc329364 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/c32936475b0302adcc313dae2d9ad98d08fb697b / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-linkchecker/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/linkchecker/LinkCheckerThread.java : XRENDERING-231: Allow passing link state context data in the InvalidURLEvent event source - http://git.io/5CJsOA  
10:39 <CIA-118> Vincent Massol master \* rae18c24 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/ae18c240eb6b1448b8a076696846a32437324bf8 / (2 files in 2 dirs): [Misc] Log improvement + typo fixes - http://git.io/ZazTAw  
12:06 <vmassol> guys platform build is broken  
12:06 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/testReport/  
12:11 <vmassol> has quit  
12:12 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
12:13 <CIA-118> tmortagne stable-4.1.x \* r114bb3d https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/114bb3df734f96c33dc1638c5e99662b6146fc57 / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-extension/xwiki-commons-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/handler/internal/ExtensionApplicationStartedListener.java : XCOMMONS-252: Load core/local extension when explicitely asking for it - http://git.io/tyICRg  
12:13 <CIA-118> tmortagne master \* r690abcd https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/690abcd337a012d029dea4b5d09feb4ee3588d62 / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-extension/xwiki-commons-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/handler/internal/ExtensionApplicationStartedListener.java : XCOMMONS-252: Load core/local extension when explicitely asking for it - http://git.io/VxZkEw  
12:22 <CIA-118> Jean-Vincent Drean master \* rfdda6f1 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/fdda6f134b9b1d5532e2b7f7c3179f5d1e861162 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8160 : HiddenDocument query filter can put corrupted user documents in the cache (virtual mode) - http://git.io/m3SwNA  
12:27 <CIA-118> Jean-Vincent Drean stable-4.1.x \* rfaf9427 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/faf942739560ac6e2a8172895f1a6e10a34b33bd / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8160 : HiddenDocument query filter can put corrupted user documents in the cache (virtual mode) - http://git.io/c4roYg  
12:44 <mflorea> has quit  
12:50 <CIA-118> Jean-Vincent Drean stable-4.1.x \* r0a70940 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0a70940ea09ef1bad990bead6baaefc241ad1aba / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8164 : User preferences configuration source doesn't work with users from different wikis (virtual mode) - http://git.io/kc89Zw  
13:03 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:31 <mflorea> has quit  
14:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:11 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:11 <vmassol> jvdrean: would be great to ask tillo to retest with the modified query manager jar…  
14:11 <vmassol> (I'm on holidays today FTR… leaving home soon… ;))  
14:13 <vmassol> jvdrean: you shoudl also close tillo's issue as a duplicate or the new one you've created  
14:13 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <+jvdrean> vmassol: actually I renamed tillo's issue  
14:15 <vmassol> ah ok  
14:15 <vmassol> (didn't realize, sorry)  
14:16 <CIA-118> has quit  
14:17 <+jvdrean> tillo: would you mind trying to replace your existing jar by this one http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/platform/xwiki-platform-query-manager/4.2-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-platform-query-manager-4.2-20120831.104049-384.jar and tell us if it fixes your issue ?  
14:17 <vmassol> (and without your "quick fix" ofc ;))  
14:18 <tillo> :D  
14:18 <tillo> 5 minutes ago I patched my class and retested, without the workaround.  
14:18 <tillo> And it works.  
14:18 <vmassol> great :)  
14:18 <vmassol> (you patched with jvdrean's fix?)  
14:19 <tillo> Again thank you, and I'm happy I made XWiki more stable ;)  
14:19 <vmassol> yep thanks, wasn't an easy one...  
14:19 <tillo> Yes, I applied the modifications of https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/fdda6f134b9b1d5532e2b7f7c3179f5d1e861162  
14:19 <tillo> I guess they will be integrated in m-3.  
14:20 <vmassol> ok thanks, btw you say you've been using xwiki for a while… if you're happy with it, consider writing a short testimonial for the project!  See http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/Testimonials  
14:20 <vmassol> ;)  
14:20 <vmassol> tillo: yes 4.2M3 and 4.1.4  
14:21 <tillo> Eheh, you should work on sales :)  
14:21 <+jvdrean> tillo: great, thanks!  
14:22 <vmassol> thanks!  
14:22 <vmassol> not sales, marketing :)  
14:22 <tillo> The second leads to the first, you know ^^  
14:23 <vmassol> yeah… I tried sales and didn't like it but marketing is ok when done right ;)  
14:23 <vmassol> brb  
14:28 <tillo> Back to work. Bonnes vacances to you and congratulations on the project to everyone!  
14:28 <tillo> I'll keep my bounce here if you don't mind ;)  
14:29 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: ping  
14:31 <vmassol> tillo: thanks, sure we're happy to have more people on the channel!  
14:42 <CIA-119> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <Denis1> has quit  
14:58 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
14:58 <vmassol> thanks tillo :)  
15:03 <tillo> You are welcome ;)  
15:08 <CIA-119> has quit  
15:14 <vmassol> has quit  
15:22 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Pong  
15:27 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: was about slash escaping issue in Tomcat. Do we have a policy about this, i.e. if a client refuses to enable escaping because he's afraid of security vulnerabilities, what should I sasy, "rename your pages"?  
15:28 <@sdumitriu> Yep, "if you don't want to let tomcat use / and \, then don't create pages with those characters"  
15:32 <+mflorea> ok, thanks  
15:34 <mflorea> has quit  
15:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:39 <CIA-117> has joined #xwiki
